EmailTemplate.name: 2016Q3.Global.NUR.1739.Airscale.Email 2 - E-Book
EmailTemplate.subject: Innovate in an instant with new radio access. Get the E-Book
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Make your radio network 5G-ready AirScale Radio Access Rethinking your Radio Be ready for growth with a radio access network that is more agile and easily scalable to meet new demands the instant they arise. By 2025 the Internet of Things will be a 484 billion Euro opportunity and 5G will be worth 247 billion US$ to mobile operators.
Our E-Book will show you how to prepare with unlimited capacity and connectivity to meet any 5G and IoT requirement. Discover:
- The three guiding principles for future radio networks - How to close the gap between telco and IT - Ten ways AirScale can transform your radio network - Why it’s crucial to start rethinking your RAN today ©2016 Nokia.
